alert.note: Alert for Amelia; Chesterfield; Dinwiddie (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 01 at 6:29PM EDT until July 01 at 7:00PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wakefield has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Chesterfield County in central Virginia... Northwestern Dinwiddie County in south central Virginia... Southeastern Amelia County in central Virginia... * Until 700 PM EDT. * At 629 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Scotts Fork, or near Mannboro, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mannboro around 635 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Beach, Winterpock, Walkers, Earls, Ammon, Denaro and Winterham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Please report severe weather by calling 757-899-2415, posting to the NWS Wakefield Facebook page, or using Twitter @NWSWAKEFIELDVA.
